members.name: tag
members.description: Store the tag name to make it easier to obtain directly.

members.name: plugins
members.description: an array of plugins to load as [ [classname,  relativePath] ]

members.name: observer
members.description: mutation observer for table

members.name: makeChart
members.description: Makes chart and returns the chart object.

members.name: _chartistLoaded
members.description: determines if Chartist is ready

members.name: _CSVtoArray
members.description: Mix of solutions from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8493195/how-can-i-parse-a-csv-string-with-javascript-which-contains-comma-in-data

members.name: _getUniqueId
members.description: Get unique ID from the chart

members.name: fullOptions
members.description: gets options plus plugins

members.name: _getChart
members.description: Renders chart when chartData changes

members.name: _loadScripts

parameters.name: fnc
parameters.description: function to rerun when script is loaded

members.description: uses ESGlobalBridge to load scripts

members.name: _renderTable
members.description: updates table when data changes

members.name: _updateChartData
members.description: updates chartData from data

members.name: _updateData
members.description: Updates data from table

members.name: id
members.description: The unique identifier of the chart.

members.name: type
members.description: The type of chart:bar, line, or pie

members.name: scale
members.description:
The scale of the chart. (See https://gionkunz.github.io/chartist-js/api-documentation.html)```
Container class	Ratio
.ct-square          1
.ct-minor-second	  15:16
.ct-major-second	  8:9
.ct-minor-third	    5:6
.ct-major-third	    4:5
.ct-perfect-fourth	3:4
.ct-perfect-fifth	  2:3
.ct-minor-sixth	    5:8
.ct-golden-section	1:1.618
.ct-major-sixth	    3:5
.ct-minor-seventh	  9:16
.ct-major-seventh	  8:15
.ct-octave	        1:2
.ct-major-tenth	    2:5
.ct-major-eleventh	3:8
.ct-major-twelfth	  1:3
.ct-double-octave	  1:4```

members.name: responsiveOptions
data
members.description:
Use an accessible table in unnamed slot for maxium accessibility and SEO. As table: .........
label 1
1
DEPRECATED Method: { labels: ["label 1", "label 2", "label 3"] series: [ [1,2,3], [4,5,6] ] }

members.name: dataSource
members.description: Location of the CSV file.

members.name: showTable
members.description: The show data in table form as well? Default is false.

members.name: chartTitle
members.description: DEPRECATED: Use heading slot instead for progressive enhancement.

members.name: chartData
members.description: Raw data pulled in from the csv file and converted to an array.

members.name: chartDesc
members.description: DEPRECATED: Use desc slot instead for progressive enhancement.

members.name: options
members.description: The options available at  https://gionkunz.github.io/chartist-js/api-documentation.html.

members.name: pluginAxisTitle
pluginPointLabels
pluginFillDonutItems
members.description:
Optional array of items for chartist-plugin-filldonut,
as in items : [{ class : '', id: '', content : 'fillText', position: 'center', offsetY: 0, offsetX: 0 }]
See https://github.com/moxx/chartist-plugin-fill-donut

events.name: chartist-render-created
events.description: Fired once chart is created features are added.

events.name: chartist-render-draw
events.description: Fired as shapes are being drawn.
